title.narrative: Power Sector Recovery Performance Based Operation

description.narrative: The objectives of the Operation are to improve the reliability of electricity supply, achieve financial and fiscal sustainability, and enhance accountability.

participating-org.narrative: Federal Ministry of Finance, Budget and National Planning

title.narrative: PIPs of DISCOs are implemented to remove the constraints to supply in their networks
New tariff shortfalls are funded from non CBN sources once the PAF is depleted​
Public awareness about ongoing power sector reforms and performance among women increases
Annual electricity supplied to the distribution grid is increased
Public awareness about ongoing power sector reforms and performance increases
DISCOs’ recurrent payment obligations to NBET are paid
Audited financial statements of DISCOs are published annually
Historical tariff shortfalls and associated interest are removed from DISCOs’ books
Key operational and financial data for the power sector are published quarterly on NERC website
Business continuity arrangements for DISCOs are implemented
End-user electricity tariffs are adjusted consistent with FGN approved PSRP Financing Plans
Revenue requirement of DISCOs is set consistent with semi-annual MYTO minor reviews and MYTO extraordinary review
